comments.author: NIGHTDREADED
comments.body:
"[Go to AskTeachers](https://www.reddit.com/r/AskTeachers/)[**r/AskTeachers**](https://www.reddit.com/r/AskTeachers/)‚Ä¢1 hr. ago[BestTrip2612](https://www.reddit.com/user/BestTrip2612/)

# I turned this in for my math test and walked out, curious about what the teacher thinks of me now"

Really dude?

"I hate math" is not a valid excuse for just... literally not trying. You literally wrote nothing related to any of the math problems... you didn't even attempt them.

These aren't even hard problems. You didn't have to doodle during the quiz. You could have doodled after the quiz. And yet you consciously chose to instead ignore the questions... and doodle.

This is on you bro.

comments.body: That aint even hard math lil bro
